title: The Student Mental Health Crisis
sub_head: Generation Z discusses the rise in depression and anxiety of the past years.
body: Editor’s note: In this Future View, students discuss mental health. Next week we’ll ask, “Recent shootings have increased calls for gun control again. Should we tighten controls on guns as far as the Second Amendment allows? Should we have a constitutional amendment revoke the original Second Amendment?” Students should click here to submit opinions of fewer than 250 words before May 24. The best responses will be published that night.
